snippet: James Corden, a bubbly, burly, bearded British actor and comedian not widely known in America, must decide what to create, keep or throw away in the program he is inheriting on CBS.
abstract: Profile of James Corden, British comedian and actor who is preparing to take over as host of CBS program Late Late Show.
lead_paragraph: James Corden, a bubbly, burly, bearded British actor and comedian not widely known in America, must decide what to create, keep or throw away in the program he is inheriting on CBS.

headline.seo: James Corden Prepares for ‘Late Late Show’ on CBS
headline.main: One Great Unknown Steps Into Another
headline.print_headline: One Great Unknown Steps Into Another
